description: Manage end-to-end recruitment for diverse roles across industries. Source, screen, and select top talent while delivering a positive candidate experience and meeting hiring targets.
responsibilities: Source candidates through job portals, LinkedIn, and referrals; screen resumes and conduct initial phone interviews; coordinate technical and HR interview rounds; manage candidate pipelines and ATS; negotiate offers and onboard new hires; build relationships with hiring managers; maintain recruitment metrics and reports; participate in job fairs and campus recruitment.
